title: DRDO LRDE Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 105 Apprentice Trainee Posts
description: The Electronics & Radar Development Establishment (DRDO LRDE) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 105 Apprentice Trainee Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, B.Sc, and ITI can apply for the DRDO LRDE Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can appl...
